title.rendered: “IDF Airstrike Neutralizes Rocket Launcher Amid Ongoing Tensions with Hezbollah”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In a closing loop from the air: The IDF attacked the terrorist who launched rockets earlier today towards Arab al-Aramsha.

Earlier today, a terrorist from the Hezbollah terrorist organization attempted to launch rockets towards the Arab al-Aramsha area. The launches failed and did not cross into Israeli territory.

Shortly thereafter, Battalion 9 identified the terrorist who had launched the rockets in the Wadi Hamul area, and in a rapid closing loop, an Air Force aircraft attacked the terrorist.

In recent hours, several launches have been identified crossing from Lebanese territory, most of which fell in open areas, with no casualties reported.

The IDF targeted the sources of the fire with artillery.
